entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is encouraging the students to gather around. He is described as giving an odd, shrieking cry that echoes through the dark trees.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the students in Hagrid's class and is being nudged by Harry to look at something.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is another student in Hagrid's class and is pointing out something to Ron.

entities.name: dragon
entities.description: A dragon is being called by Hagrid and is described as having a 'dragonish face, neck'.
